description: Gluten free Vegan brownies and brownie mix. Oats + almonds + smooth chocolate. Add walnuts or other nuts for variation. Easy Soy-free Palm oil free Recipe. Makes a 9 by 9 or 8 by 8 inch brownie pan
name: Vegan Gluten free Brownies and Brownie mix
recipeIngredient: 2 tbsp starch like corn or arrowroot
3/4 cup sugar (use 2 to 3 tbsp less for less sweet, powdered)
1/2 cup vegan semi sweet chocolate (or dark chocolate or combination)
1/2 cup non dairy milk (use 1/4 cup + 3 Tbsp non dairy milk if making with brownie mix)
3 to 4 tbsp Oil (or use applesauce or half oil)
Add in: 1/3 cup vegan semi sweet chocolate chips to add to batter

recipeInstructions.text: Add the flours through sugar to a blender and blend well. Move the flour around as it can get packed under the blender blade. Add the chocolate, cocoa, flax seed meal and vanilla. Blend again until well combined. Move the flour around again and check under the blender blade. Transfer to a quart mason jar. Add 1/3 cup chocolate chips to the jar and store.
